physical_appearance: "This is an assemblage consisting of baby amulet beeds, silk screen images of familiries and embroidery. The base fabric is that of traditional Visayan ""patadyong"". The central image has a green tint
subject_terms_1: and is framed in a square shaped embroidery. Two other silk screen images of individuals can be found on the top right and left corners. " memory  group identity  collective biographies biography (genre)  ethnicity
subject_terms_2: material culture (genre)  Visayan Islands (Philippines) Group identity Ethnicity Collective memory  Biography
